name: Back to The Dungeon
description:
Back to the dungeon is an Action-Adventure, Run and Gun, Platformer Game.

You pick up your guns and head into a dangerous dungeon.

On the way to the dungeon, there are dangerous enemies and traps that even the developers have not been able to defeat.

Dodge attacks using jumps and dashes.

Move forward, taking care of your feet.

A variety of weapons are available. Assault rifles, sniper rifles, and even cannons!

Choose your favorite weapon and go to fight with monsters.

+ Sorry! Our game does not support game pads.

Use your keyboard and mouse.
